Body: In order to explain the evolution of the third person accusative pronoun in IE languages, Mark Beadles makes use of the concepts of middle and medio-passive voices. But the discussion that followed his answer seems to show that these concepts are not so clear to everyone. So, what exactly is a middle voice (and a medio-passive voice, for that matter)?
Title: What is a middle voice and a medio-passive voice?
